text: Lars Gustaf Westman (16 April 1934 - 16 January 2021) was a Swedish writer and journalist. Westman was the grandson of architect Carl Westman and the artist Elin Westman. He was a journalist at Stockholms-Tidningen and the magazine We. In 2012, he published the book Till Saltsjöbaden. Westman died on 16 January 2021, aged 86.Journalisten och författaren Lars Westman död ==References== Category:Swedish journalists Category:1934 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Swedish novelists
title: Lars Westman (writer)
